description: Latency and cache hit graphs for Kubernetes apiserver.  Useful for observing performance of Amazon EKS clusters.

panels.title: API Server - Memory Usage by instance
API Server - CPU Usage by instance

targets.expr:
sum by(verb) (rate(apiserver_request_total{code=~"5..",job="$job", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
 / sum by(verb) (rate(apiserver_request_total{job="$job", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(instance) (rate(apiserver_request_total{code=~"5..", job="$job", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
 / sum by(instance) (rate(apiserver_request_total{job="$job", instance="$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: API Server - HTTP Requests by code
API Server - HTTP Requests by verb
API Server - Stacked HTTP Requests by instance
API Server - HTTP Requests Latency by instance

panels.description: 95th percentile request latency for Kubernetes apiserver component
panels.title: API Server - HTTP Requests Latency Percentile
API Server - HTTP Requests Latency by verb
